isolation_source: surface seawater in antarctica
Other comments: synthesize PUFA eicosapentaenoic acid (20: 5omega3) at low temperatures. Needs [Na+] of >20 mM. RB-8T and RB-9 showed better growth at temperatures below 25?°C, with a broad growth temperature optimum between 1 and 15?°C and a maximum growth temperature of about 27–28?°C. The minimal growth temperature was estimated to be ?6·8?°C
